### Course Workload Estimator
I joined with Betsy Barre and Justin Esarey to modify their course workload estimator. The enhanced estimator includes additional fields particularly salient to online course designs.
[Course Workload Estimator 2.0](https://cat.wfu.edu/resources/tools/estimator2)

### Chunking Content, Online Course Design
I received an invitation to present to the faculty of the School of Law in preparation for online and remote instruction in Fall 2020. I was tasked with delivering a webinar that addressed3 the theory and practice behind segmenting instructional content for online and digital learning environments.
